description.en: The man before whom everyone bowed down. The killer who ruined my life. Daphne is the daughter of the emperor's mistress. She spent her childhood in unimaginable luxury, but one day she drew the emperor's wrath. Even though she was a princess, she was treated coldly, like a servant. The only one who showed kindness to Daphne was Crown Prince Ashrad, who hoped that one day they would become a family. Ashrad was irresistible. Everyone was enchanted by him; everyone obeyed him. He ruled over all, including Daphne. He was her god... and also the one who shattered her entire world. Daphne is trying to escape from the killer who trampled her life, but…

altTitles.en: Living With a Kunoichi

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

description.en: 29-year-old programmer Suzuki Ichirou finds himself transported into a fantasy RPG. Within the game, he's a 15-year-old named Satou. At first he thinks he's dreaming, but his experiences seem very real. Due to his use of a 3-time-use special power (meteor shower), he ends up wiping out an army of lizardmen and becoming very high level. He hides his level and plans to live peacefully and meet new people, though developments in the game story (like the return of a demon king) might get in his way.
description.pt-br: Suzuki Ichirou é um programado de 29 anos que subitamente fora levado a um mundo diferente, trajando apenas roupas comum e no level 1. Ele obteve um nível elevado e inúmeros tesouros após utilizar 3 vezes uma habilidade descartável, [Meteor Shower], chuva de meteoros. Após superar essa crise, ele decidiu realizar um "Turismo em outro mundo? Superando adversidades, fazendo amigos, obtendo companheiros, ocasionalmente derrotando demônios, lordes demônios e pessoas mal-intencionadas, Satou aproveita o seu dia-a-dia nesta calorosa história de fantasia.

A Complicated Older Sister and Younger Brother 4-Koma

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

description.de:
„Ich werde nicht kampflos untergehen!“ Für Prinzessin Cecile war es unvermeidbar, den Kaiser des benachbarten Reiches zu heiraten. Aber Moment! Ist das nicht der Kaiser Estian, der bekannt dafür ist, ein herzloser Sadist zu sein?! Um einen letzten Hauch von Würde zu bewahren, verlangt die furchtlose Cecile, dass ihr zukünftiger Ehemann sie von der Kutsche bis hin zur Hochzeitskapelle auf Händen trägt. Wenn ihr Leben schon so enden soll, kann sie wenigstens kämpfen, bis sie von dem gut aussehenden Kaiser getötet wird. Schließlich bekämpft man Feuer am besten mit... noch mehr Feuer? Kann Cecile zu einer Schurkin werden, die noch mehr gefürchtet wird als ihr tyrannischer Ehemann? Der Comic zum Hit-Roman.

description.en:
One day the tyrant, Estian, sent a marriage proposal to Cecil. She got dragged to the empire unwillingly but when she saw the emperor's face she had a change of heart.

"You're quite the hottie aren't you?"

 She liked her husband. And her husband likes her back too! To live happily with her tyrant husband does Cecil need to become a villainess far worse than the tyrant?!

---
“I would rather just go out with a bang!”

For Princess Cecile, being married off to the emperor of a neighboring empire was unavoidable. But wait, isn’t this the same Emperor Estian who's notorious for being a heartless sadist?  In order to maintain her final shred of dignity, the fearless Cecile demands that her future husband carry her all the way from the carriage to the wedding chapel! If this is her fate, she might as well put up a fight before dying at the hands of the handsome emperor. After all, the only way to fight fire is with… more fire?! Can Cecile become a villain even more fearsome than her tyrant husband? Based on the hit novel.

description.es:
Pese a su destino, la princesa Cecile se rehusará a vivir condenada. Por tradición, las princesas están obligadas a casarse con un emperador, el que sea que quiera tomar su mano. Cecile, con tan mala suerte, ha sido elegida por el emperador Estian para ser su esposa. ¿Cuál es el problema? Estian es conocido como el emperador más violento, sádico y desalmado de todo el territorio. En su primer encuentro, como un acto de desesperación, Cecile decide combatir el fuego con... ¡más fuego! ""¡Si voy a morir, lo haré con estilo!"", se dijo a sí misma. Si Estian es malvado, Cecile lo será aún más. No lo esperábamos pero tal vez este matrimonio sí tenga futuro...

description.fr:
La princesse Cécile a vraiment du mal à se résigner à faire face à son destin inévitable, celui d'épouser du jour au lendemain l'empereur tyrannique d'un empire voisin. Désespérée, elle change soudain d'avis face à la beauté éblouissante de ce tyran sans cœur. Désormais décidée à vivre en tant que femme de ce despote, elle devra alors devenir encore plus méchante que lui afin de survivre à ses côtés. Mais y parviendra-t-elle ? «Tu as du talent et du potentiel, Cécile» ...Du talent? Du potentiel? Pour devenir la parfaite méchante pour le tyran?

description.ru:
Однажды тиран Эстиан прислал Сесиль предложение руки и сердца. Её неохотно притащили в империю, но когда она увидела лицо императора, то передумала.

«-Ты просто красотка, не так ли?»

Она любила своего мужа.
И ему Сесиль тоже нравится!

Чтобы жить счастливо со своим мужем — тираном, нужно ли Сесиль стать более злобной, чем он?!

Bir gün zorba Estian, Cecil’e bir evlenme teklifi gönderdi. Cecil istemeden imparatorluğa sürüklendi ama imparatorun yüzünü görünce fikrini değiştirdi. ”Oldukça ateşlisin, değil mi?” Kocasını sevdi. description.uk:
Одного разу тиранічний імператор Естіан надіслав пропозицію заручин позашлюбній принцесі Сесіль. Проблемну наречену з клопотом привели в імперію, але коли та побачила обличчя майбутнього чоловіка, передумала зривати весілля. 
"- Ти незрівнянна красуня Сесіль, чи не так ?"
Вона кохала свого чоловіка, а той кохав її.
Чи потрібно героїні стати лиходійкою, щоб щасливо жити зі своїм чоловіком тираном ?

description.vi:
Trong chốc lát, Cecil trở thành cô dâu của Estian - một tên bạo chúa khét tiếng. Cô bất đắc dĩ bị lôi đi, nhưng khoảnh khắc nhìn thấy gương mặt hoàng đế, cô đã ngay lập tức đổi ý. Đây chẳng phải mỹ nam hay sao?. Cô rất ưng người chồng này. Và anh ấy cũng yêu cô! Nhưng, để có thể sống hạnh phúc trăm năm cùng với chồng, cô phải trở thành một ác nữ độc ác hơn cả bạo chúa?!

---
Một ngày nọ, bạo chúa, Estian, đã gửi lời cầu hôn tới Cecil. Để sống hạnh phúc với người chồng bạo chúa, Cecil cần phải trở thành một nữ nhân vật phản diện tồi tệ hơn nhiều so với bạo chúa?!

description.pt-br: Um dia, o tirano Estian enviou uma proposta de casamento a Princesa Cecil. Ela foi arrastada para o Império sem querer, mas quando viu o rosto do imperador, mudou de ideia. “Você é muito gostoso, não é?” Ela gostou do marido. E o marido também gostou dela! Para viver feliz com o marido tirano, Cecil precisa se tornar uma vilã muito pior do que ele?!

altTitles.ja: きみはかわいいれぷたいる

altTitles.en: You Are a Cute Reptile

description.en:
Itsuki Fukunaga (27) is the manager of a reptile store. Surrounded by his favorite reptiles, he spent every day happily. But one day, Fuu-chan, a bearded lizard with a chin turned into a human girl. Her personality and gestures are the same as when she was a reptile. 

A exciting love comedy with 120% reptile geekiness and 120% lovey-dovey!

altTitles.en: The Tutorial Is Too Hard

altTitles.ja: チュートリアルが死ぬほど難しい

description.en:
Lee Hojae had given up his life as a pro gamer, until one day he received a mysterious message: 

"Congratulations! You’ve been invited to the Tutorial World."

Intrigued, he enters the game and confidently chooses Hell difficulty, but soon learns that he is trapped there. With a mere 0.01% survival rate, Hojae must somehow overcome the game’s agonizing challenges to figure out the real reason he was invited.

This tutorial may be tough, but its secrets are what’s truly hellacious.
description.ja:
元プロゲーマーの堂山海は、ある日突然「チュートリアル」という名の異空間に招待された。 軽い気持ちで最凶クラスの難易度「ヘル」を選択してしまった彼は、離脱不可能、生存率ほぼゼロの「死にゲー」に挑むことになってしまった。 殺伐としたこの世界で生き残るために課せられたミッションをクリアしながら、チュートリアルに秘められた秘密を解き明かしていく。

description.ko:
gandara 퓨전 판타지 장편소설 '튜토리얼이 너무 어렵다' 가 웹툰으로 독자 여러분을 찾아갑니다.

삶이 무료하던 어느 날, 내 눈앞에 나타난 초대 메세지. 
[튜토리얼 세계에 입장하시겠습니까?] 

그리고 뒤이어 나타난 난이도 선택 창. 
[이지] [노말] [하드] [헬] 나는 주저없이 헬 난이도를 선택했다. 

그리고 후회했다. 

아무리 헬 난이도라지만, 이건 너무 심하잖아.

Однажды, посреди серых скучных будней, перед глазами появляется уведомление. [Вы хотите пройти обучение?]

За ним сразу же вылезло окно выбора сложности. [Лёгкая] [Обычная] [Сложная] [Адская]. Я без колебаний выбрал адскую сложность.

Знаю, она называется адской, но это слишком.

title.en: Despite Coming From the Abyss, I Will Save Humanity

altTitles.zh: 来自深渊的我今天也要拯救人类

altTitles.zh-ro: Láizì Shēnyuān De Wǒ Jīntiān Yěyào Zhěngjiù Rénlèi
Laizi Shenyuan De Wo Jintian Yeyao Zhengjiu Renlei

altTitles.en: I Who Came From Hell Also Want Save Mankind
I, The Abyssal, Have Decided to Save Humanity Again Today

description.en:
The Abyssals represent pure destruction. They have unparalleled power and follow their instinct to remove all life from the world. However, one day, a traitor appeared among them. Silvija, a clueless girl, woke up on the battlefield and learned that she is the "Twilight Abyssal" that the humans hate. After escaping numerous pursuits, Silvija was adopted by the Ilia family and gradually formed her conviction.
*She will save mankind using the body of an Abyssal. She will protect the kindness and warmth she received.*
However, it seems the Will of the Abyssals does not intend to succumb to her...

"Miss Silvija, it's time to display your power."
"Eh~ but I hafen't finifed my defferts yet..." Still a Chad as ever.
PS: The protagonist is single. Feel free to tease her~
description.zh:
深渊——代表着纯粹的湮灭，它们拥有无与伦比的强大力量，遵循着本能吞噬世间的一切生命。 然而某一天里，它们中出了叛徒。 “希尔维嘉小姐，是时候展示您的力量了。” “诶~可是甜点，没有次完。” 她今天依然是个猛男。 
PS:本书主角单身。 欢迎来撩~

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

altTitles.en: Soara and the House of Monsters
Soara and the Monster Houses

description.en: One day a young warrior girl meets a dwarf who dedicates himself to constructing houses for monsters. A tale of building houses for myriads of creatures begins! After all, everyone needs a home.

altTitles.en: I Don't Trust My Own Sister
I Don't Trust My Twin Sister

description.en:
The richest woman in the world, Laurentia Aztana, had success in both work and beauty, but her life was unhappy. She discovered that the illness of her sister, Erusia, was a complete lie, and that she was cooperating with her fiancé to buy all of her possessions. It was a treacherous story of betrayal.

At the moment Laurentia was forced to turn her back on her pain and remorse, she had gone back eleven years before her engagement. Her faith in Erusia, her affection for her fiancé; all of it could go to hell. Listen carefully, Sister, there is no good sister now. I pledge to redesign my life.

The first thing is, I’m tied up with a national hero who cannot possibly deal with the tr*sh left in the past. Oh, the debt that you took unfairly, I’ll fix it. Instead, become my marriage partner.

altTitles.en: I Want To Go Back Home.

description.en:
Ordinary salaryman X isekai = a dispirited life in another world!?
He worked normally, ate normally, and slept normally. Salaryman Shimoyamaguchi Ichirou was satisfied with his simple but happy everyday life.
One day, he was summoned to another world to fight as a hero, but was as well received as a 1-star character pulled in a gacha game...
"Ugh, I just want to go home..."
Which way will tomorrow lead Shimoyamaguchi!?
description.ja:
平凡なサラリーマン×異世界=しょんぼり転生…!?
普通に働き、普通にご飯を食べ、普通に寝る。そんな平凡なハッピーで物足りた日常を過ごすサラリーマン・下山口一郎。
ある日突然、英雄として異世界に召喚されたけど、評価は★1つのハズレガチャ扱い……。
「嗚呼、もう帰りたい……」下山口の明日はどっちだ──!?

title.en: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.ja: クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurasu no Gyaru ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.en: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air

altTitles.id: Aku Dianggap Seolah-olah Udara Oleh Gadis Gyaru Di Kelas

altTitles.es-la: Las chicas de mi clase me tratan como el aire

description.en: A boy named Ryuuji Aizawa is getting treated by his gyaru classmates like he wasn't there, like this girl named Nana Aino who sits on his seat. With him still in it.
description.es-la: Un par de gals parecen no notar al chico delante de ellas.

altTitles.zh-ro: Sanguozhi Qunxiongzhuan: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

altTitles.zh-hk: 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!

title.en: Koori no Hime wa Chiisana Hidamari de Tokasaretai

altTitles.ja: 氷の姫は小さな陽だまりでとかされたい

altTitles.en: The Ice Princess Wants to Be Melted by a Little Bit of Sunlight

description.en: Aoba, a first-year high school student who takes care of his younger siblings in place of his busy parents, ends up playing at the home of his classmate Mizutori, a cool beauty known as the "Ice Princess"...?
description.ja:
多忙な両親に代わり、保育園児の弟妹を世話する男子高校生の青葉実晴は、恋愛をする暇はないが、弟妹と楽しく過ごしていた。ある日、クラスメートで「氷の姫様」と呼ばれるクール美女・水鳥雪の自宅で遊ぶことになった青葉は、「私を笑顔にしてくれませんか？」と水鳥に頼まれて…！？ 

幼い弟妹を大切に想う高校生たちの青春ラブコメ開幕！

title.en: Put It All In The Ring! 2

altTitles.en: Put it all in the Ring 2

altTitles.ja: リングにかけろ2 最終章

description.en: At the end of Ring ni Kakero 1, Ryuuji Takane went up against Superstar Jun Kenzaki for the World Title. Now, 17 years later, Rindo Kenzaki, the son Jun Kenzaki and nephew of Ryuuji Takane, lives with Ishimatsu Katori, the "Kenka Champion" from Ryuuji and Jun's time. Rindo will meet up with a new generation of boxers to create a new Golden Japan Jr. to take on the world.

title.en: Zettai ni Yuuwaku sarenai Otoko VS Zettai ni Yuuwaku suru Onna

altTitles.ja: 絶対に誘惑されない男vs絶対に誘惑する女

altTitles.en: A Man Who Never Be Tempted VS A Girl Who Tempt Perfectly

description.en: Reishi Kiyota, a ronin student, has a phobia of love due to a traumatic experience and has never been with a woman in his life. His neighbor, Aika Toyokawa, an office worker, likes Reishi and tries to seduce him with all her might..!
description.ja:
**「絶対に誘惑してあげるーーだから早く私に堕ちて♡」**

隣に住んでいるお姉さんがある日突然誘惑してきた！？

浪人生の清田玲史はトラウマから恋愛恐怖症を抱え、女性とは縁のない生活を送っていた。
アパートの隣人であるOL・豊川愛香はそんな玲史を気に入り、持ち前のあざとさを駆使しあの手この手で玲史を誘惑していくのだった…！

ちょっぴりえっちな、ほこたてラブコメディ♡

altTitles.en: Boyfriend Sometimes Girlfriend

altTitles.fr: Petit ami de temps en temps petite amie

description.en: Akizuki Hodaka, a high school student just turned 17, met the school’s madonna, Shishizaki Chihaya due to a certain turn of events. Prepared to be shot down, he gambled it all by telling her 'I love you. Please go out with me!' And that how they started going out. But Chihaya has a secret Hodaka cannot even imagine…? A kind of love changes everything. The curtain raises on a new frontier in shonen love comedy!

altTitles.en: Shino and Ren

description.en:
"I can't... take it... any longer..."

"She's mine."

The quiet and gentle Shino and the lively tomboyish Ren are lovers.
description.ja:
「我慢……でき…ないよ」

「こいつ私のなんだけど」

おっとり穏やかな志乃（シノ）と、ボーイッシュで活発な恋（レン）は恋人同士。
description.pt-br:
"Eu não aguento... mais esperar..."

"Ela é minha."

A tímida e gentil Shino e a animada e moleca Ren são amantes.

altTitles.en: Romance Not Romantic

description.en:
“You’ve manifested as a recessive Omega.”
No way…But I only came here to get a check up for a bad hangover?!
Overworked and overwhelmed with stress, Back-End Developer, Jinha, manifested as an Omega.
Jinha brews resentment for the leader of the Strategic Planning Team, Hyunjoon, and decides to open a savings account solely to save money to later hire a hitman.
But of course, bad luck comes in threes.
Now that his body is vulnerable to other’s pheromones, the only way to stabilize his body and its craving is with Hyunjoon’s refreshing pheromones.
But the only thing that Jinha can trust is Modern Medicine!
When seeking medical advice to somehow overcome his situation, the only prescription given to him as the safest method, is to have sex with someone that’s compatible and of the same gender.
Not only is Jinha feeling hopeless as he navigates through his hardship, but a stalker appears and attempts to shower him with his pheromones.
Finding himself with no other choice, Jinha asks Hyunjoon for help.

Asako’s living her dream, working at the toiletry maker Lilia Drop. Little do her coworkers know, the reason she loves the company so much is that she’s ashamed of her body odor, and their soap is the only thing that does the trick. So when the company’s lead product developer, a perfuming genius, approaches her in the lobby and wonders what “that smell” is, she’s terrified … but could it be … that he likes it? And, even more surprising to Yae … does she like him?

TV Dorama adaptation: [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718871-ase-to-sekken)
description.ja:
女性に絶大な人気を誇る化粧品＆バス用品メーカー・リリアドロップに勤めるOL・八重島麻子（やえしまあさこ）は、重度の汗っかきなのがコンプレックス。

デオドラント製品が手放せない生活の中、ある日、商品開発部の名取香太郎（なとりこうたろう）に、「君の体臭は素晴らしい！ 新商品の石鹸開発のため、これから毎日、君のにおいを嗅ぎに来ます！」と言われてしまう。

でも、においを嗅がれるのは、そんなに嫌でもなくて……？

多汗女子と嗅覚男子の、超純愛フェチラブコメ、爆誕!!
description.uk: Асако Яешіма — боязка офісна працівниця фірми туалетних товарів Lilia Drop. Асако любить компанію, тому що вона соромиться своїх проблем із потовиділенням і запахом тіла, а запах мила, виробленого компанією, — єдине, що здатне зняти її невпевненість. Однак, коли Котаро Наторі, провідний розробник продукту компанії, підходить до неї та відчуває її аромат, він заявляє, що любить запах Асако і вважає його надихаючим. Оскільки вони продовжують зустрічатися по роботі, Асако починає менше піклуватися про те, що її обнюхує Котаро, і вони починають романтичні стосунки.
description.pt-br: Em um romance de escritório, há uma linha tênue entre sexy e estranho… e essa linha é onde Asako – uma mulher que transpira copiosamente – conheceu Koutarou – um desenvolvedor de perfume que não se cansa do perfume da Asako. Asako está vivendo seu sonho, trabalhando na fabricante de produtos de higiene pessoal Lilia Drop. Mal sabem seus colegas de trabalho, o motivo pelo qual ela ama tanto a empresa é que ela tem vergonha de seu odor corporal, e o sabonete deles é a única coisa que resolve. Então, quando o principal desenvolvedor de produtos da empresa, um gênio da perfumaria, se aproxima dela no saguão e se pergunta o que é “aquele cheiro”, ela fica apavorada… Mas será que… ele gostou?

description.en:
A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---
description.fr:
Un monde dans lequel la Corée est le Pays leader des sports de combats. Au lycée Nam-il où les meilleurs et plus talentueux élèves en arts martiaux étudient, Jiu Ji-tae se trouve soudainement entraîné avec eux alors qu'il n'est qu'un faiblard.  
  
En faisant disparaître ses défauts physiques à l'aide du Ju-Jitsu, pourra-t-il devenir le meilleur des classes de combat ?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/mymmx89)
description.pt-br:
Em um mundo onde a Coréia do Sul é a capital mundial dos esportes de combate, o Colégio Namil é onde os melhores e mais talentosos estudantes de artes marciais competem, e nosso protagonista Jiu Jitei se encontra subitamente em meio à eles mesmo sendo um fracote completo.
  
Superando suas fraquezas com jiu-jitsu, será que Jitei consegue chegar ao topo das turmas de luta?

title.en: Ane ga Kensei de Imouto ga Kenja de

altTitles.zh: 姐姐是剑圣妹妹是贤者

altTitles.ja: 姉が剣聖で妹が賢者で

altTitles.en: My Older Sister is a Sword Saint and My Younger Sister is a Sage

altTitles.ja-ro: Ane ga Kensei de Imouto ga Kenja de

description.en:
The Ralk Kingdom is a country of extreme meritocracy, but Razel, the son of the stupid king, has no talent for martial arts, and because he is always compared to his older sister who is a sword saint and his younger sister who is a sage, he gets banished from the kingdom. 

From then on, he tries to live as an adventurer in a different country, but his older and younger sisters, who love him dearly, come after him!? A lovey-dovey life of an adventurer with strong and slightly lewd sisters begins!
description.ja:
超実力主義国家、ラルク王国。その国王の息子でありながら武の才能がないラゼルは、剣聖の姉や賢者の妹と比べられ、追放されてしまう。
そんなラゼルは持ち前のポジティブさで、別の国で冒険者として生きていこうとするのだが、彼を溺愛するお姉ちゃんたちと妹が追ってきて!?
強くてちょっとエッチなお姉ちゃんたちとのイチャイチャ冒険者生活、スタート！
description.pt:
A superpoderosa nação de Ralk onde o poder determina tudo. Razel, que é o filho do rei, é exilado do país porque não tem talento para espada e magia em comparação com suas irmãs. Com pensamentos positivos, ele procura um país diferente para aprender a ser aventureiro e viver livremente, mas suas irmãs que o amam também o acompanham.   
  
Uma fantástica aventura com suas irmãs começa!

title.en: The Player Who Can't Level Up

altTitles.ru: Игрок, который не может повысить уровень

altTitles.en: The Player That Can’t Level Up

altTitles.pt-br: The Player Who Can't Level Up: O Mestre dos Egos

altTitles.es-la: El jugador que no puede subir de nivel

description.en:
When Kim Gigyu received his invitation to become a player (a unique-ability player, at that), he thought his struggles were over. But no matter how hard he tries, he just can’t seem to get past level 1!

After five years of working as a guide on the lower floors of the tower, he’s finally discovered his ability to link with “Egos” and raise his stats. As his new skills unlock adventures in unexplored gates, Gigyu gets his chance to defy expectations and show the world that rank isn’t everything.
description.ko:
18세의 나이에 '플레이어'로 각성한 김기규.

'탑'을 오르고 '게이트'를 닫으며 인생이 탄탄대로일 줄 알았는데...

튜토리얼을 아무리 클리어해도 레벨1.

1일 1고블린을 해도 레벨1.

5년이 지나도 레벨1.

"누가 알았겠냐고, 이런 플레이어가 있는지."

그 누구도 몰랐다.

탑을 뒤흔들 레벨1의 역대급 반전 능력을!

description.ru:
В возрасте восемнадцати лет Ким Ги Кю стал Игроком и был призван в Башню. Он считал, что теперь его жизнь просто обязана наладиться…
Но что бы он не делал, как бы не старался, даже спустя пять лет его уровень оставался прежним.
Никто, в том числе и сам Ким Ги Кю, не предполагал, что его способностям только предстоит раскрыться и сотрясти Башню до основания!

description.zh:
我，王雨泽，肩负生活重担，过着平凡的生活。18岁生日那天，在我面前出现了可以改变生活的机会。我拿到了只有天选之人能收到的顶级任务挑战邀请函！同时我还成为了万中之一的特殊天赋者。但5年过去后，我的等级还是最初级。到底是什么阻碍了我的升级道路，到底要怎么做才能成为顶尖玩家？

description.pt-br:
Espera aí… Por que não estou subindo de nível? E por que minhas espadas falam?

Kim Gigyu despertou como jogador aos 18 anos. Ele pensou que sua vida estava no caminho do sucesso por estar escalando a “Torre” e concluindo “Portais”… Mas, mesmo depois de terminar o tutorial, ele estava no nível 1. Matava um goblin por dia e ainda estava nível 1. Mesmo depois de 5 anos, ainda estava nível 1. “Quem pensaria que esse tipo de jogador existiria?” Ninguém.

altTitles.en: The Cost of Violence
Price of Violence

description.en: On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.
description.fr: Le jour où Shiho, champion de kendo décide d’aider sa mère célibataire à tenir un restaurant de gukbap, il apprend que sa sœur, Shiyeon, s’est suicidée. Pendant les funérailles, Shiho se rend compte que quelque chose cloche. Ce n’était pas un suicide, elle a été assassinée. Pour découvrir la vérité et venger la mort de sa sœur, Shiho reprend son sabre et entame sa propre guerre.
description.ru:
В день, когда мастер кендо Шихо решает всё бросить и помочь своей матери-одиночке в управлении небольшим ресторанчиком, он узнаёт о том, что его младшая сестра Шиён, которая училась в университете Сеула, покончила с собой. 
Во время похорон Шихо замечает кое-что странное. 
Чтобы узнать правду и отомстить за смерть сестры, Шихо снова берёт в руки уже знакомый меч и начинает свою собственную войну.

altTitles.th: ลูกไม้หล่นไม่ไกลต้น

altTitles.en: Look Alike Daughter

description.en: Beautiful and intelligent, Somyung Gil has tirelessly strived to fulfill her mother's vision of the perfect daughter. However, when her less-than-perfect younger brother is tragically found drowned in a river, doubts plague Somyung's heart. She begins to suspect that their mother might be responsible for the unspeakable act. From then on, her paramount goal becomes escaping her mother's grasp, while all her mother wants is for Somyung to experience the perfect life she herself was denied. Will Somyung ever truly find her freedom?

altTitles.en: Sorry, I like you

description.en: Rie and Yuri have been friends since childhood. Living together every day, Yuri thinks Rie needs a boyfriend. Does she even need one?
description.pt-br: Rie e Yuri são amigos desde criança. Convivendo todos os dias juntos, Yuri pensa que Rie precisa de um namorado. Será que ela precisa de um mesmo?

title.en: Shinmai Ossan Boukensha, Saikyou Party ni Shinu hodo Kitaerarete Muteki ni Naru.

altTitles.ja: 新米オッサン冒険者、最強パーティに死ぬほど鍛えられて無敵になる。

altTitles.en: The Middle-Aged Newbie Adventurer, Trained to Death by the Strongest Party, Became Unbeatable

altTitles.zh: 大叔新人冒险者 被最强小队拼死锻炼后无敌了

altTitles.zh-hk: 大叔新人冒險者 被最強小隊拼死鍛煉后無敵了

altTitles.ko: 신참 아재 모험가, 최강 파티에서 죽을 정도로 단련해서 무적이 된다

description.en: It is common knowledge that it is best to become an adventurer when you are as young as possible, because the magical power that is the basis of an adventurer's strength will hardly grow if you don't train it while you are young. But this man, Rick Gladiator, who became an adventurer when he was over thirty years old, had the combat power of an S-rank adventurer, the highest rank in the world. In fact, Rick has lived an unimaginable life with the members of the legendary Orihalcon Fist, a party of the continent's strongest adventurers. From dragons to vampires, Rick's fighting prowess, trained by his literally "monster" mentors, allows him to defeat elite adventurers one after another who try to underestimate him.
description.ja: 漫画を担当するのは、週刊少年ジャンプにて「レディ・ジャスティス」を連載していた、荻野ケン！ド迫力のバトルアクションと、怒涛のギャグ！　魂のこもったキャラが縦横無尽に活躍する漫画版をお楽しみください！！　『冒険者になるのはできるだけ若いうちがいい』しかしその男、なんと30歳を過ぎてから冒険者を目指したリック・グラディアートルは、新米ながら最高位[Ｓランク]並みの戦闘力を有していた。　伝説のパーティ「オリハルコン・フィスト」──ドラゴンからヴァンパイアまで、文字通り「モンスター」級の師匠たちに鍛え上げられた戦闘力でなめてかかってくるエリート冒険者を次々にねじ伏せていく。「出遅れ…？何歳から冒険者やったって何歳から新しいこと始めたって…いいだろ！」
description.pt-br: É de conhecimento geral que é melhor se tornar um aventureiro quando você é o mais jovem possível, porque o poder mágico que é a base da força de um aventureiro dificilmente crescerá se você não o treinar enquanto é jovem. Mas esse homem, Rick Gladiator, que se tornou um aventureiro quando tinha mais de trinta anos, tinha o poder de combate de um aventureiro de classificação S, a classificação mais alta do mundo. Na verdade, Rick viveu uma vida inimaginável com os membros do lendário Orihalcon Fist, um grupo dos aventureiros mais fortes do continente. De dragões a vampiros, a destreza de luta de Rick, treinada por seus mentores literalmente "monstros", permite que ele derrote aventureiros de elite um após o outro que tentam subestimá-lo.

altTitles.th: แบล็กโคลเวอร์

description.en:
Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church, and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus. However, as they grew up, some differences between them became plain. Yuno was a genius with magic, with amazing power and control, while Asta could not use magic at all, and tried to make up for his lack by training physically. When they received their Grimoires at age 15, Yuno got a spectacular book with a four-leaf clover (most people receive a three-leaf-clover), while Asta received nothing at all. However, when Yuno was threatened, the truth about Asta's power was revealed, he received a five-leaf clover Grimoire, a "black clover"! Now the two friends are heading out in the world, both seeking the same goal!

---

**Links:**  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18802) (special)  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19743) (anime)
description.fr:
Asta et Yuno ont été abandonné ensemble à la même église, et sont inséparables depuis. Enfants, ils promirent qu'ils seront en compétition pour voir qui sera le prochain Mage Empereur. Toutefois, en grandissant, quelques différences entre eux émergèrent. Yuno était un génie avec la magie avec un pouvoir et un contrôle incroyable, pendant qu'Asta ne pouvait pas du tout utiliser la magie, et essayait de compenser cela en entrainant son corps. Quand ils reçoivent leur grimoire à 15 ans, Yuno obtient ub kivre spectaculaire avec un trèfle à 4 feuilles (la plupart des gens reçoivent un trèfle à 3 feuilles), pendant qu'Asta ne reçoit rien du tout. Toutefois, quand Yuno fut menaçé, la vérité derrière le pouvoir d'Asta fut révélée. Il reçoit un grimoire avec un trèfle à 5 feuilles, un "trèfle noir" *(un "black clover")* ! Maintenant, les deux amis s'en vont vers la capitale, les deux cherchant le même objectif !


**Liens:**  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18802)  *(special)* 
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19743) *(anime)*
description.pl: Asta to młody chłopak, który marzy o zostaniu największym magiem w królestwie. Jest tylko jeden problem: nie potrafi używać żadnej magii. Na szczęście otrzymuje Pięciolistną Koniczynę, niesamowicie rzadką księgę czarów, dzięki której chłopak zyskuje moc niwelowania wszelkiej magii. Czy ktoś, kto nie używa magii, może zostać Imperatorem Magii, magiem nad magami? Jedno wiemy na pewno: Asta nigdy się nie podda.Portuguese (BR) / Português (BR)Em um mundo em que até as tarefas mais simples do dia a dia são feitas com o uso de magia, quem não consegue usá-la é tratado como nada! Esta é a vida de Asta, um jovem que mesmo sem um pingo de magia, sonha em se tornar o Mago Imperador, o mais forte de todos os magos! Com muito esforço e trabalho duro, será ele capaz de atingir seus objetivos e superar seu genial rival e amigo de infância, Yuno?!!
description.ru: В мире, где магия – это всё, рождается мальчик Астер, который не в состоянии использовать какую-либо магию. Ещё ребенком он был оставлен у порога бедной церкви. Сейчас ему 15, и, чтобы доказать свою силу и сдержать обещание, данное другу, он стремится стать Королём Чародеев!
description.pt-br: Em um mundo em que até as tarefas mais simples do dia a dia são feitas com o uso de magia, quem não consegue usá-la é tratado como nada! Esta é a vida de Asta, um jovem que mesmo sem um pingo de magia, sonha em se tornar o Mago Imperador, o mais forte de todos os magos! Com muito esforço e trabalho duro, será ele capaz de atingir seus objetivos e superar seu genial rival e amigo de infância, Yuno?!!

altTitles.ja: たゆたう煙は掴めない

altTitles.en: Can’t Catch The Shimmering Smoke

description.en: Chiaki, a college student without a girlfriend, meets Miyako, a waitress at a shisha store, through a matching app recommended by a friend. This is a love story that lyrically depicts a faint love that begins with a matching app and shisha.
description.pt-br: Chiaki, um estudante universitário sem namorada, conhece Miyako, uma garçonete de uma casa de shisha, através de um aplicativo de relacionamento recomendado por um amigo. Esta é uma história de amor que retrata poeticamente um sentimento inicial e delicado, nascido em um aplicativo de celular e embalado pelo aroma do shisha.

description.en:
"The deadline is six months, within which you must kill your husband."

On the first night of their marriage, I possessed the body of 'Alice,' a villainous supporting character who was ordered by her mother-in-law to kill her husband.

I thought I was married off to a duke who's a living  corpse for the sake of money, but lo and behold, this duke has a great body and is handsome as well. Instead of killing him, I looked for a way to survive by using divine power instead of poison.

"Mother, I will become a priestess for the duke!
As a priestess, I shall pray for the duke's well-being for the rest of my life!"

On the day I was about to leave the duke's mansion, my husband who had been unconscious suddenly woke up.

"You're the one who brought me out of the darkness, so take responsibility."

He wakes up and demands I take responsibility after saving him?

A transfer student desperately seeking someone to relate to pursues the attention of a mysterious boy covered in bandages, thinking he might finally be able to build a friendship for the first time since a tragic accident.

Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

altTitles.en: My Neighbor Ms. Kurokawa

description.en:
_The secret between me and her is trivial yet important._

Hajime Takahashi, enrolled in Shuubi High School solely because it's the sacred place of his favorite manga. Everywhere in the school are locations that appeared in the manga, and he's super excited! Amidst this excitement, Takahashi meets a beautiful girl, Yayoi Kurokawa, who looks just like the heroine from his favorite work, and they come to share a certain secret. 

This awkward duo weaves a sweet and tangy youth romantic comedy that will make you grin!
description.ja: 僕と彼女の秘密は、些細だけど大切で。大好きな漫画の聖地、それだけが理由で秀美高校に入学した主人公・高橋一。学内はどこに行っても作品に出てきた聖地だらけで大興奮！そんな中、高橋は大好きな作品のヒロインそっくりな美少女・黒川弥生と出会い、とある秘密を共有することに――。不器用な2人が織りなす甘酸っぱくて、ニヤニヤしちゃう青春ラブコメ‼

title.en: I Became a Childhood Friend of a Mid-Level Boss

altTitles.en: I Became the Childhood Friend of the Middle Boss

description.en:
Do Kyunwoo is the black sheep of his renowned swordsman family. He cannot even catch a rabbit on his own. On his first day of fifth grade, he meets a tranfer student and recalls his past life.

He had reincarnated into the world of a game he used to play called [Brave Hearts]. He was already frustrated that he had reincarnated as a loser, but on top of that, the transfer student is an intermediate/mid-tier boss who will destroy the world!

“Why are you being so nice to me?”

“Because I want to be friends with you.”

Do Kyunwoo’s plan is to become friends with the transfer student in order to prevent the end of the world!

In order to survive in this new world and to reach an ending he desires. He becomes best friends with the mid level boss.
Sequel to Kengan Asura. Takes place 2 years after the tournament.

title.en: Hangyaku no Yuusha ~Skill wo Tsukatte Haraguro Oujo no Kokoro to Karada wo Shouakuseyo~

altTitles.ja: 反逆の勇者～スキルを使って腹黒王女のココロとカラダを掌握せよ～

altTitles.en: Hero of the Rebellion: Use Your Skills to Control the Mind and Body of the Maddened Princess

altTitles.id: Pahlawan Pemberontakan: Gunakan Keahlianmu Untuk Mengendalikan Pikiran Dan Tubuh Putri Yang Gila

description.en:
When Sasahara Shinta was suddenly summoned to another world with the objective of subjugating the Demon Lord, he makes full use of his cheat skill that sees people’s status and tries taking a look at the Princess who summoned him, but when he did, it says that the Hero is arranged to be assassinated after the Demon Lord’s subjugation.

That’s right, this is a shitty otherworld where the Hero’s life is treated like dirt!

To avoid being assassinated, Shinta pretends to submit, but…
description.id:
Suatu hari, Shinohara Shinta tiba-tiba dipanggil sebagai pahlawan ke dunia lain yang penuh dengan kedengkian terhadap para pahlawan.

Sekelompok iblis yang memiliki sikap ramah, namun membenci pahlawan di balik layar berencana untuk membunuh Shinta. Shinta, yang dengan cepat mengetahui hal ini dengan keterampilan seorang pahlawan, merencanakan untuk menjebak Putri Alicia, yang merupakan pemanggil dan dalang rencana pembunuhan terhadapnya.

 Metodenya adalah "tidur", yang membuat semua orang tidak berdaya, dan mengeluarkan isi perut sang putri melalui kesenangan yang dipaksakan. Dengan arti "pemberontakan", 

"aku akan mengajarkannya ke dalam tubuhmu"
description.ja:
「せいぜいワタクシの手のひらの上で踊っていただきますわ。そして魔王を倒した暁には……」

ある日突如、篠原シンタが勇者として召喚された異世界は、勇者への悪意に満ちた世界だった。表面では好意的な態度を取りながら、裏では勇者を嫌悪し、シンタの暗殺を企てている鬼畜の集まり。そのことを、勇者のスキルを使い早々に看破したシンタは、召喚主であり、暗殺計画の首謀者である王女・アリシアの篭絡を目論む。

その方法は、誰もが無防備になる『寝込み』をついて、強制的な快楽によって王女を骨抜きにするというもの。『反逆』の意味を込めて、お前のカラダに教え込んでやるよ——。

title.en: Shin no Nakama janai to Yuusha no Party wo Oidasareta node, Henkyou de Slow Life suru Koto ni shimashita

altTitles.en: Banished from the Hero's Party, I Decided to Live a Quiet Life in the Countryside

altTitles.ja: 真の仲間じゃないと勇者のパーティーを追い出されたので、辺境でスローライフすることにしました

altTitles.zh: 因为不是真正的伙伴而被逐出勇者队伍，流落到边境展开慢活人生

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin no Nakama Janaito Yūsha no Party o Oidasa Retanode, Henkyō de Slow Life suru Koto ni Shimashita

altTitles.zh-hk: 因為不是真正的夥伴而被逐出勇者隊伍，流落到邊境展開慢活人生

altTitles.ru: Изгнанный из отряда героя, я решил поселиться в глубинке
Син но накама дзя най то ю:ся но па:ти: о оидасарэта нодэ, хэнкё: дэ суро: райфу суру кото ни симасита

altTitles.th: ผมโดนกลุ่มผู้กล้าขับไสเลยต้องไปสโลว์ไลฟ์ที่ชายแดน

altTitles.ko: 진정한 동료가 아니라고 용사 파티에서 쫓겨났기 때문에, 변경에서 슬로우 라이프 하기로 했습니다

altTitles.zh: 因为被认为并非真正的伙伴而被赶出了勇者的队伍，所以来到边境悠闲度日

altTitles.zh-hk: 因為被認為並非真正的夥伴而被趕出了勇者的隊伍，所以來到邊境悠閒度日

altTitles.es: Desterrado del grupo de los héroes, he decidido vivir una vida tranquila en la frontera

altTitles.fr: Après avoir été banni du groupe du Héro, j'ai décidé d'aller vivre une vie calme à la frontière

altTitles.en: I Was Kicked out of the Hero’s Party Because I Wasn’t a True Companion so I Decided to Have a Slow Life at the Frontier

description.en:
Red, who was a member of the Hero's party acting as a scout, strategist and negotiator, is the elder brother of a young girl that has the Divine Protection of the Hero and that battles against the Demon Lord. He has the Divine Protection of the Guide, which grants him a high initial level. As this Protection only grants him that and nothing else - no magic, martial arts prowess, or supernatural ability - he gradually becomes unable to keep up with the battle. As a consequence, one of his companions, a Sage, accuses him of not being a true companion, snatches all his equipment and kicks him out of the party leaving him just a copper sword.  
  
Having his heart completely shattered, Red distances himself from the battle against the Demon Lord’s army despite knowing that the fate of the world rests on it, aiming to live an inconspicuous life alone at the frontier town of Zoltan as he earns money to open a herbalist shop by utilizing the knowledge he acquired throughout his journey.  
  
Together with the Half-Elf Carpenter living downtown and the Princess who couldn’t become the Hero’s companion, he aims to live a slow life in the frontier of the world governed by a person’s inborn Divine Protection!
description.ja: 初期レベルが高い『導き手』の加護を持つレッドは、次第に戦いについていけなくなり勇者のパーティーから追い出されてしまう。辺境の地へ流れたレッドは、薬草屋を開業して第２の人生をスタートさせるのだが――!?
description.pt-br: A história acompanha Red, um aventureiro que é expulso da grupo de heróis após ser apontado como um atraso para os demais guerreiros, já que, mesmo tendo sido escolhido, ele não tem grandes habilidades mágicas ou físicas. Sendo jogado fora pelos seus companheiros, Red se afasta das batalhas e decide viver uma vida pacifica em uma cidade distante, mas as constantes cobranças do seu passado, assim como o aparecimento de uma bela garota chamada Rit, e de seus antigos membros de equipe, faz com que não seja tão simples assim viver do jeito que Red espera.

title.en: Ore no [Kantei] Skill ga Cheat Sugite ~Densetsu no Yuusha wo Yomi "Tori" Saikyou e~

altTitles.ja: 俺の『鑑定』スキルがチートすぎて ～伝説の勇者を読み“盗り”最強へ～

altTitles.en: My [Appraisal] Skill Is Too Overpowered ~Reading and Stealing the Legendary Hero’s Skills to Become the Strongest~

description.en:
When Mel Rairoot, an orphaned boy, turned 15, he was given the unique skill of [Appraisal], which allows him to read information about people and objects. Moreover, it was an extraordinary skill that should not exist, surpassing even the legendary rank S... rank EX! 

However, since [Appraisal] can also read information about people, there is a risk that it will be targeted by criminals who want to hide their identities. Mel's life is immediately targeted, and although he somehow manages to fight back, he is now being pursued! 

Mel is forced to live on the run with Silphy, the princess of the elf country who has lost her memory, and Clara, a tiger girl. However, he makes full use of his cheat ability to brilliantly overcome many difficulties! With the "Eye of God" in his hands, the boy reads and steals the power of the legendary hero, and rises to the top!



[Webnovel link](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7932dt/)
description.ja:
天涯孤独の少年メルが15歳になって授かった固有スキルは人や物の情報を読み取る『鑑定スキル』。しかも、幻のランク“S”をも超える、存在しないはずのランク“EX”だった！

“神の眼”を手にしたメルは、記憶を失くした幼なじみ・エルフの王女シルフィ、虎人族の少女クララとともに故郷を目指す旅に出る！

description.en: On the moon, there is an advance civilization of bunny people who used to be identical to humans, but after incorporating themselves with bunny genes, transformed into docile creatures. The result is a society where AI are entrusted with all choices, from the content of meals to how each minute of leisure time should be spent. Amongst this society is a bunny girl named Uko who dislikes this lifestyle, complaining "Let me choose for myself!!". One day, Uko decides to flee the moon and head to Earth where she meets Hane, a bunny girl investigating life on Earth. On this planet with many strange customs, these two will...!?

In ancient times, a vile dragon summoned a flood that drowned the village. Since then, every year, the villagers would sacrifice a bride to the dragon for it to eat, doing so ensured the safety and peace of the village. This year, it is the Black Dragon YanMing’s turn to take the sacrificed bride, however he takes no interest in humans and would rather live on a diet of fruits. But, due to the constant nagging of the housekeeper, magpie XiQue, he had no choice but to go to the village and receive the bride offered by the village. YanMing, who was originally against the idea of going, couldn’t help but notice that the “mute” bride was so strange! She wasn’t afraid of him, but instead, very excited?! Whatever…let's capture her first!

altTitles.en: Ｃ０ＤＥ：ＢＲＥＡＫＥＲ
Code:Breaker

description.en: Sakurakouji Sakura is a girl who appears modest and graceful but in reality is skilled in martial arts. After witnessing a boy burning people with his blue flame, she is startled to see that the same boy is a transfer student, Oogami Rei. Oogami is a Code Breaker, one who "does not exist". He is a seemingly cold-blooded killer who follows the principle of "an eye for an eye", to "use evil against evil". Convinced that killing is not right, Sakurakouji sets out to stop him and penetrate his icy heart.

title.en: Motokano Sensei wa, Choppiri Ecchi na Katei Houmon de Kimi to no Ai wo Hagukumitai.

altTitles.ja: 元カノ先生は、ちょっぴりエッチな家庭訪問できみとの愛を育みたい。

altTitles.en: Ex-girlfriend Teachers Want to Nurture Love by Making Slightly Naughty Visits to Your Home

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Kano-sensei wa, Choppiri Ecchi na Katei Houmon de Kimi to no Ai wo Haguku Mitai.

description.en: The new teachers at high school student Toruma Nijino's school are his ex-girlfriends who dumped him in the past! Moreover, both Akamine Shuri and Shirasawa Kohaku are still in love with him. He is happy to see them again, but.... But he is not happy to see them again... "Hey, can I kiss you?" "Do you hate sleeping with me?" They start competing with each other at the same time, trying to make an already established fact with Tohru before graduation. Moreover, they live in the same apartment complex as Tohru and are trying to secretly nurture their love as a "commuter wife"...? This is a sweet love comedy with ex-girlfriend teachers who tempt you with everything they've got!
description.ja: 高校生・虹野透真の学校に新任教師としてやって来たのは、かつて彼を振った元カノたちだった！　しかもその教師、赤峰朱里と白沢琥珀の二人はどっちも透真に未練がありまくり。思いがけない再会に喜ぶ透真だったが……。「ねえ、チューしていい？」「私との添い寝、嫌いになったの？」卒業までに透真と既成事実を作ってしまおうと、ふたり同時に抜け駆けスタート。しかも透真と同じマンションに住み、「通い妻」としてこっそり愛を育もうとしてきて――!?　全力で誘惑してくる元カノ教師との、甘々ラブコメディ！！

altTitles.en: Sword of the Demon Hunter: Kijin Gentosho

description.en: In the Edo period, there was a shrine maiden called "Itsukihime" in the mountain village of Kadono. Jinta, a young man who acts as the shrine maiden's guardian despite being a stranger, encounters a mysterious demon who speaks of the far future in the forest where he went to defeat it. From Edo to the Heisei era, this huge Japanese fantasy series follows a demon man who travels through time while continuously questioning the meaning of wielding a sword.

title.en: Kyuuseishu «Messiah» ~ Isekai wo Sukutta Motoyuusha ga Mamono no Afureru Genjitsu Sekai wo Musou suru

altTitles.ja: 救世主《メシア》～異世界を救った元勇者が魔物のあふれる現実世界を無双する～

altTitles.en: The Savior «Messiah» ~ The Former Hero Who Saved Another World Beats the Real World Full of Monsters

altTitles.zh-hk: 救世主《彌賽亞》～現實世界無雙～

description.en: The "former" savior, Takeru Yamato, was summoned to another world and executed because of his strength. When he wakes up, he finds himself in Japan, where he spent time before being summoned. However, in the city, demons appearing from "gates" rampage, and those called hunters fight using magic. Returning from another world, Takeru decides to hide his powers and live, but...
description.ja: 異世界に召喚され、その強さ故に処刑された「元」救世主・大和猛。 目を覚ますとそこは、召喚される前に過ごしていた日本だった。 しかし、街では”ゲート”から現れる魔物が暴れ、ハンターと呼ばれる者たちが魔術を用いて戦っていた。 異世界帰りの猛は、力を隠して暮らす事を決めるが――…。

altTitles.en: Far Eastern Incident

description.en:
September 1945, Tokyo. A troubled post-war process is underway. 
It is the extermination of the Variants, human weapons created by the notorious 731 Unit: remnants of the war which are to be shut down.  
Yet a young immortal soldier girl, Saika, is determined to live and be free with the aid of Kankuro Konoe, a former combat medic, as her subordinate.
description.es:
Septiembre de 1945, Tokio. Un proceso de posguerra está en marcha. Es el exterminio de las armas humanas "Unidad 731", los vestigios de la guerra que deben ser eliminados.  
Una joven soldado inmortal, Saika, está decidida a vivir y ser libre, con la ayuda de Kankuro Konoe, un antiguo médico de combate como su subordinado.

altTitles.es: La Leyenda de los Héroes de la Galaxia (Fujisaki Ryu)

altTitles.en: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (Fujisaki Ryu)

description.en:
New adaptation of the novel.  
  
The story is staged in the distant future within our own Milky Way Galaxy, approximately in the late 36th century. A portion of the galaxy is filled with terraformed worlds inhabited by interstellar traveling human beings. For 150 years two mighty space powers have intermittently warred with each other: the Galactic Empire and the Free Planets Alliance. Within the Galactic Empire, based on mid 19th century Prussia, an ambitious military genius, Reinhard von Müsel, later conferred Reinhard von Lohengramm, is rising to power. He is driven by the desire to free his sister Annerose, who was taken by the Kaiser as a concubine. Later, he wants not only to end the corrupt Goldenbaum dynasty but also to defeat the Free Planets Alliance and to unify the whole galaxy under his rule.  
  
In the Free Planets Alliance Star Fleet is another genius, Yang Wen Li. He originally aspired to become a historian through a military academy, and joined the tactical division only out of need for tuition money. He was rapidly promoted to an admiral because he demonstrated excellence in military strategy in a number of decisive battles and conflicts. He becomes the archrival of Reinhard, though they highly respect one another. Unlike Reinhard he is better known for his underdog victories and accomplishments in overcoming seemingly impossible odds and mitigating casualties and damages due to military operations.  
As a historian, Yang often predicts the motives behind his enemies and narrates the rich history of his world and comments on it. One of his famous quotes is: "There are few wars between good and evil; most are between one good and another good."  
  


---
description.ru:
Новая экранизация романа.  
История человечества всегда была историей войн, во все времена, во все эпохи. И во все эпохи находятся люди, оставляющие след в истории, чьи имена выжжены на её скрижалях. Этих людей называют героями.  
В третьем тысячелетии, когда люди давно переселились с Земли на просторы Галактики, между абсолютной монархией Галактический Рейх и республикой Союз Свободных Планет уже 150 лет продолжается война. И на озарённом пламенем войны небосклоне зажигаются звёзды героев, судьба которых - изменить мир.

altTitles.th: พยัคฆ์ร้านกลายพันธุ์

description.en:
Jin Clice is a super dashing spy, special agent for Japan's elite espionage program, whose body was mortally wounded by the KGB. 
Having already invested a lot of money in him, the agency would not allow him to die so easily though. Desperately trying to save his life, 
the government transferred his mind into the body of a recently deceased tennis player which happens to be a young beautiful woman! 
The dashing ladies man has, in essence, gone from being Bond to being the Bond girl!

You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.ja: 彼女たちは穴をうめたい
They want to fill in the holes.

altTitles.en: They Want to Fill in the Holes

description.en: “Whom will you go out with?” Those were the words Doumoto Genki was confronted with on his first day of high school.  Now he has to figure out which one of the “out of this world” beauties he wants to date!
description.ja: 体が丈夫なことが取り柄である主人公・弦貴。高校に入学することを機に、新たな出会いに胸を膨らませていたところ、突然2人の美少女・カリンと聖から告白される！ そんな彼女たちの目的は彼とドッキングすることだった…!! ドッキングとは一体何か。ドッキングで何ができるのか。そして彼女たちは何者なのか…!?
description.pt-br: **”Com quem você vai sair?”** Essas foram as palavras com as quais Doumoto Genki foi confrontado no seu primeiro dia na escola secundária. Agora ele tem que descobrir qual das belezas “de outro mundo” ele quer namorar!
